Daniel stood on the deck, clad only in shorts. His huge gut wobbled at even the slightest movement.

"Thanks, Mr. Daniel!" replied Jessie.

The otter looked up to the clear blue sky. "Getting hot, isn't it? Why don't you come inside for some ice water?"

As Jessie sipped the cold water, he examined the inside of Daniel's home. It was the first time he was ever actually inside. It was spacious, obviously it had to be for such a fat fur to move around. It was also clean and well furnished and, most importantly, cool.

The otter waddled around the corner and joined the red panda in the kitchen. He handed the fur a wad of bills.

"Thanks, Mr. Daniel!" Jessie said. "This is a very nice home you have here! Much better than my apartment. We don't even have AC!"

"Well, we liked to stay cool in this house," Daniel said as he drank from a large glass of soda.

"...we? I thought you lived alone."

"Nope. My, uh, friend Evan lives here. Come, I'll introduce you!"

Soon, the two stood outside of a shut bedroom door. Daniel knocked twice and opened the door slightly, peaking inside. "Evan, are you decent? I have someone to introduce you to!" The otter pushed the door open. He gestured for Jessie to walk in, and the red panda nervously did so.

"Is this the Jessie you've been talking so much about?" asked the blue lion, lounging on his side on a huge bed.

Jessie was too stunned to speak. He had seen many lions before, but never one so blue, or so bulky. The lion's belly was tremendous, almost completely spherical, and nearly five feet wide. But to Jessie, it didn't look like fat. To him, it looked like a waterbed, almost. The lion adjusted his position a little bit and ripples went throughout his belly. Jessie knew it definitely wasn't fat. His moobs, as big as cantaloupes, sagged off his chest, each had a plump purple nipple on it. As Jessie slowly approached the lion, he could swear he saw a little bit of fluid leak from them. The lion's bottom half was covered by a sheet, but a quick glance and the red panda could tell his legs were just as bulbous. While not nearly as big as Daniel, this lion was still pretty massive, and something about him was jus-

"Don't you know that staring is rude?" the lion asked, a sly smile creeping across his face. His plump cheeks grew plumper

"Oh, sorry...it's just..." Jessie stuck out a paw. "Eh, I'm Jessie. Nice to meet you."

"Evan. Nice to meet you too." He shook the young red panda's paw. The lion's whole body jostled and jiggled about, his chest wobbling particularly violently. Jessie could now see a decent dribble of dark blue fluid drip from Evan's nipple.

The blue lion saw what Jessie was looking at. "Oops. Sorry. I guess I'm feeling extra juicy today!"

"Feeling extra..." began Jessie.

The lion grabbed one of his moobs and gave it a squeeze. A jet of liquid shot out, nearly hitting Jessie. "Want to try some?"

"Oh...um...well..."

Nervously, Jessie stuck a paw out and dabbed up someone the liquid. He brought his paw towards his mouth and licked a little. "God...this...it's so good!"

"Want some more, handsome?" asked Evan. The red panda nodded. He patted the bed next to him and soon Jessie was latched onto a nipple, sucking away, juice occasionally spilling down the side of his mouth. Evan leaned back and groaned. It had been too long since his last juicing. Through eyes half squinting in pleasure, he saw Daniel licking his lips. "Jealous?"

"Well, when you drop a pant size or two, I'll let you have some more," Evan said while caressing the back of Jessie's head. "Remember: I need you to stay mobile!"

151121211111.title: A Little Extra Help

15112122.content:

Daniel sighed deeply. "Okay, okay. Um, where to start? Well, I haven't always been this skinny. Only about a week, in fact. These clothes fit me last month. I mean, kinda. The pants were getting pretty tight..."

Evan stared in awe at Daniel. The tent-like shirt he was wearing easily could have fit him and another fur inside. "No way. There's no chance you have been so big just a week ago!"

"It's true! Lemme show..." He reached into the pocket of his enormous pants. His paw slipped, and the garment fell to the floor. Daniel began to hoist them back up, but seeing that his shirt hung down nearly to his knees, he didn't bother. Everything that needed to be covered up was being covered by his shirt. Tapping his paw on his phone, the otter pulled up a photo and tilted the screen towards Evan. The photo was of a naked incredibly fat otter, easily over 800 pounds, with a mountainous belly hanging down to his knees and a flabby chest that would put some of this girls back in Bastion to shame. "I took this last year when I started dieting. It, uh, only lasted a day and a half..."

My weight was really starting to tick up. When the scale told me I was a few pounds past 900, that gave me a shock. If I didn't do something I'd be shipped off to St Elmo's Home for the Mobility Challenged before I turned thirty. But I tired diet and exercise and everything. I couldn't lose a pound! My boss found out about what I was working on, though. I mean, how could he not when one of his lab techs becomes an eighth his size? He seized my work, confiscated my lab equipment, and even had the secruity guards jail me in my office!"

Daniel's story gave Evan an idea. "Do you still know the formula. Do you think you can make it again? The stuff that made you slim down?"

"Why?" the otter asked. "What are you pl-"

15112122.title: Breakthrough

151121221.content:
Dr. Kirkpatrick checked the apartment number again before knocking. Nobody responsed. He figured as much, knocking more out of curiosity than necessity. From his jacket, the burly bear pulled out a thin yet sturdy metal bar which he shoved in between the door and its frame. Giving the metal piece a hard yank, he heard a pop. The front door slowly opened.

Letting himself into the apartment, he shut the door behind him and latched the deadbolt. Nobody was in the living room. He was unsurprised. Glancing down the hallway he saw the door what he presumed was the bedroom was shut. The bear confidently walked down the hallway as if it was his own home. He didn't even bother to knock as he let himself into the bedroom.

"Ah...I reasoned as much..."

A nearly perfect sphere of blue fur sat in the bedroom. With a circumference of almost seven feet, the doctor could tell that the sphere wasn't solid but filled with some sort of liquid. Two paws up near the middle of the mass kicked about. Dr. Kirkpatrick walked around the sphere and found the head of a lion poking out.

"Mister Evan, I presume?" The lion said nothing. His bulbous cheeks were too massive for him to speak. His only response was the flailing of his paws.

The bear began to examine the fur. He jabbed Evan with a paw and heard a loud glosh glosh-glosh. It sounded as if someone smacked a waterbed. He rubbed a paw along the curve of his body. The skin underneath felt tight but pliable. Dr. Kirkpatrick sunk a paw in. It sank nearly a foot into the sphere of Evan's body without much resistance.

The doctor smiled. Spying a chair in a corner of the bedroom, he dragged it over towards Evan's head.

"Daniel told me I'd find you like this," the bear said as he causally crossed his legs. "He talked, you know?"

Evan furrowed his eyebrows.

"I'll give him credit. He held out for a few days before breaking. And now that he spilled the beans, he gets to enjoy a nice... retirement.

The lion's bloated face showed an expression of concern.

"He certainly was smart. But quite stupid to think he could sneak back in through the employee entrance. He was caught within ten minutes."

Evan furrowed his eyebrows again.

"So, I guess you're wondering what will happen with you now, hmm?" said the doctor. "Truth be told, I'm not sure yet. You certainly are an anomaly! A scientific phenomenon! A...property of Episteme Labs."

Evan let out a whimper.

Dr. Kirkpatrick got up from his chair. "It will take me a bit to figure out the logistics. Definitely have to knock down a wall to get you out. And a truck big enough to hide you in. But soon you'll be the subject of some of the finest scientific minds of this generation!" He gave Evan's body a pat. Ripples ran throughout.

He sauntered over to the bedroom door to let himself out. "Goodbye, Evan! Oops...I mean, see you soon."

Evan whimpered again at the door shut.
151121221.title: Critical Mission Failure

151121222.content:

After Evan asked the otter to remark the formula, he brought the lion back to the lab to test each attempt on him. Unfortunately, none of Daniel's attempts worked. While he remembered a good chunk of the formula, he just couldn't recall the last necessary components. The otter was glad that nothing he gave Evan so far had resulted in any terrible side effects aside from an occasional stomach ache, but Daniel knew time wasn't on his side.

Evan's growth episodes were less frequent, but they kept occuring nevertheless. And by the time he spent just a week at Daniel's lab, he had grown several times larger. The lion, whose fur now took on a darker hue of blue, sat on a mattress in one corner of the apartment. Though nobody would have known he was on a mattress since his body covered up the entire thing. His butt alone, each cheek as round as a beachball, dominated half the mattress. His tail was squished into the canyon of his butt crack. Evan's legs, with thighs as big as barrels and calves the size of his thighs before he started inflating, were forced apart by his humongous, spherical belly which stretch out far enough in front of him to spill out over the front edge of the mattress. ***

I think one of them must work, but without my notes I can't be sure. We got to pick one and fast before you're hit with another attack and you..."

151121222.title: Trial and Error

1511212221.content:
Evan stared up at the ceiling in his pitch-black bedroom. It was another night he couldn't sleep. And this time, he figured what the culprit was. The twin-sized bed he laid on felt like he was sleeping on a pile of dry hay. He missed the bed he had back in Port Zaftig. It was big and soft and warm. The old bed was probably the only thing he missed about that city.

Curious, he switched on the lamp sitting on his nightstand and examined his fur in the light. Blue, like it was yesterday and probably how it'll be tomorrow. He let out a sigh and counted his blessings. Daniel's formula couldn't reverse the color of his fur. But it did reverse his inflation and shrunk him back down to his normal size.

Kicking off the blankets, he pulled on a pair of boxer shorts and wandered into this living room. Soon, he was channel surfing, hoping to find something interesting to watch. He landed on the Peevington City Local Access Channel. While he absolutely hated the small town of Peevington, it's small town population certainly was an interesting bunch. And it didn't matter what he thought anyways. Daniel was convinced nobody from Episteme Labs would find them there. To his delight, the channel was airing a rerun of a show done by one of the town's conspiracy theorists.

"THEY'RE TURNING THE FROGS GAY!" barked the ape who was hosting the show.

Evan didn't have time to relax and watch the show. A loud boom followed by a sudden crack came from Daniel's room. Leaping into action, he rushed over there, flinging open the door, and turning on the bedroom light.

"Daniel! Is everything al...right?"

Laying on the broken remains of a flimsy twin bed was an otter nearly a half ton. He flailed his arms as best he could, but being covered in hundreds of pounds of extra weight all they did was slowly wave about. The otter's whole body jiggled and wobbled as he tried to get up.

Evan rushed over. "D-daniel! Is that you?" Sure enough, it was, though Daniel looked somewhat different with such comically bulbous cheeks. The lion laid a paw on the boulder of fat that was his belly to see if it was real. "What the hell happened?"

"I...don't know!" Daniel struggled to speak due to his chins and cheeks getting in the way of his ability to form words.

It took Evan nearly an hour to help Daniel get up and move his massive body to the living room couch, which groaned as the otter rested his obscenely large bottom onto it. "The...the formula..." Daniel was winded from the small walk between rooms. "Temp...temporary."

"Oh God, you might be right!" Evan exclaimed. "We need to make another batch now! Then you can figure out how to make it last longer!"

The otter nodded his head as best he could. The thick collar of pudge around his neck made it nearly impossible to fully nod. "Need...stuff...pen..."

Evan rushed back to his bedroom and grabbed a pen and paper. He stuck the pen between Daniel's fat digits and placed the paper in front of the otter's paw. Slowly, Daniel scribbled out a list. "There...done..."

The blue lion quickly read through the list. "Okay, okay...it might take me a bit but I think I can get everything..." After throwing on pants and a shirt, Evan grabbed his car keys and ran for the door.

"I'll be back as soon as I can!" Daniel only groaned in response.

Paws shaking, he stuck the keys into the ignition and revved up the engine. Checking the list again, he developed a plan on how to get everything Daniel needed for more batches of the formula. "I think...yeah, I can definitely get some of these from Wall-Mort. They're open all night, I think."

As Evan sped off into the night, his mind began to race. Even if he found everything Daniel needed, how would he prepare it? The otter was barely able to move. Maybe he just wasn't used to being that fat again. Maybe after a bit he'll be able to move around.

Had Evan not been so worked up about how to save Daniel, he would have noticed a sharp, familiar pain beginning to pop up in his stomach.
1511212221.title: New Beginnings?

A beam of sunlight peaking through the blinds of his bedroom window awoke Evan. He yawned, then rolled over. After a few failed attempts at falling back asleep, he resigned himself to starting the day.

Sitting up on his twin-sized bed, the lion inspected his fur. Blue, and just as dark was it was the day before. He sighed. Evan figured that he might spend the rest of his days a blue lion. It wasn't a terrible prospect; he would just need to deal with the occasional stares and comments from other furs. Evan didn't really blame them. Lions aren't usually blue. When he and Daniel arrived in the small town of Peevington some months ago, he was bothered a bit by the things some of the townfolks said. As time went by, though, they stopped commenting about his color and learned to accept the blue lion as one of their own.

Slipping on a pair of boxer shorts, Evan made his way to the living room. It didn't bother him if the otter saw him in his underwear. After all, Daniel has seen pretty much everything.

Evan walked back into the kitchen and leaned against the back of the couch Daniel was sitting on. "Ever hear back from that guy about the patent?"

"Wow! I knew something like that would get you a boat load of money, but that much?"

"Hey, when I was getting to be a half ton, I would have paid anything to shed the pounds." Daniel then shoveled a bunch of sausages into his mouth.

"While were on the topic..." Evan gesture towards the prominent gut the otter was sporting. Daniel had been eating like crazy since they arrived in town, and he guess the otter had gained back close to 75 pounds in a couple of months. All of which rested in the ball of dough slowly taking over his lap.

He shrugged. "I like food! So what? If I get fat again, I know how to slim back down"

"Heh, that's true." Evan took another sip of coffee.

"I mean, you could stand to put on a pound or two!" Daniel used his elbow to point towards Evan's flat-as-a-board midsection.

1511212222.title: New Beginnings?

151122.content:
The vial hissed as Evan unscrewed the top from it. Before he opened it, the liquid inside looked extremely runny. But when the liquid got in contact with the air, the lion noticed it was steadily thickening up and starting to fill to the rim of the vial. Evan panicked. He didn't want the stuff to overflow. Carefully holding the vial as the substance continued to solidify and rise to the top of its container, Evan searched through the kitchen cabinets and found a cup that had been left behind by the previous tenet. The lion was grateful as he hadn't packed much in the way of kitchen items for his trip to Port Zaftig.

He poured the substance into the cup just before it was going to spill over. It trickled out slowly and in thick globs much like pouring cold maple syrup. Once the vial was empty, Evan saw that it had filled about a third of the cup. No, a bit more than a third, closer to half. No, now it was well past half. The lion panicked again as he watched the thick fluid fill up more and more of the cup. He went back to the cupboards to find any other container that the lion could put the expanding liquid in. But the rest of the cabinets were completely empty. The lion glanced over his shoulder and saw that the golden liquid had reached the rim of the cup and would start spilling out onto the counter any second now. He began searching the rest of his apartment for any sort of container at a much faster pace. But after a few minutes of digging around, he couldn't find anything.

Returning to the kitchen counter, the lion expected to see it over-following with the mysterious liquid. But it wasn't. Instead, the fluid had stopped expanding and filled the cup right at its top. The lion picked up the cup being careful not to spill its contents. Raising it to his nose, he sniffed it. It had a sickly sweet aroma to it. Evan purred in delight as he brought the cup to his lips and took a few healthy sips of the substance. It was delicious! It reminded greatly of honey, yet it had a more fruity, flowery flavor to it, a flavor with a much greater depth than any kind of honey he had before.

"This stuff tastes amazing!" Evan muttered to himself as he drank more of the thick fluid. He drank down until half the cup was gone. Pulling the cup away from his mouth, he noticed that lots of the the gooey golden substance was stuck to the fur around his mouth. Evan set the cup back down on the counter and went to the bathroom to wash himself clean. When he came back, the lion saw that the cup was filled right back up to the rim of the cup. This greatly confused the lion, as he took a few more sips of the tasty syrup. This time, he watched as the fluid slowly filled back to the tip of the cup. Time and time again, the lion drank more and watched in amazement as the cup refilled itself. The lion was feeling full, but still he experimented with it. Drinking down until almost all of the fluid was gone, the lion was surprised to find that still the liquid was redoubling itself and filled the cup once more in a matter of minutes. He tried this a few more times, and the exact same result.

The lion placed a paw on his incredibly full stomach which was now sporting a distinct curve thanks to all of that honey-like substance he consumed. It was getting late, and the fullness of his belly was making the lion sleepy. So Evan placed the cup, just as full as ever, on the counter in a place where he was sure it wouldn't get knocked over and went to sleep.

The following morning, the lion laid in bed wondering what to do with his second day in Port Zaftig as he mindless caressed his midsection with a paw. It was no longer bloated, but a very minute layer of pudge had formed on it overnight, though Evan didn't notice. The lion was too busy thinking about how to spend the day. Yesterday was spent all day in his apartment; he hadn't really gotten to see the city yet. So he could go out any explore. Yet he was obsessed about that liquid he found. The lion just couldn't wrap his head around how it was possible that the stuff kept refilling itself over and over again. While it might be the waste of a perfectly good day, Evan thought about experimenting with the substance some more. You know, for science.
151122.title: A Taste of Honey

1511221.content:
The sun was setting in the sky as the lion sat himself down on a bench. He slowly lowered himself onto it, a paw on his incredibly full stomach. The jeans he wore were now cutting into his bloated belly, so Evan skillfully reached down and unbuttoned them allowing his gut so sink down a inch or two more.

On the bench next to him sat the culprit: A water bottle that was filled once more with the honey-like substance. Before leaving for the day, the lion had an idea. He got a water bottle from a nearby convenience store and emptied it. Pouring the yellow liquid from the cup to the bottle, Evan watched as the substance, which only filled half the bottle, reconstituted itself and in a matter of minutes, expanded to fill the rest of the bottle.

Throughout the day as Evan wandered the streets and roads of Port Zaftig, he drank from the bottle, filling his belly constantly with the golden fluid as it refilled its container as he walked. The lion was unaware how much he drank until after many hours of sipping from the bottle that Evan realized how painfully full his belly was.

Having wandered all the way to Port Zaftig's infamous beaches, the lion found a place to sit down and rest for a while to allow his stomach to empty a bit. The sky was filled with shades of purple and orange and red. The sun was just about to disappear behind the horizon, and the lion watched the first of what he hoped to be many sunsets in Port Zaftig.

Then, Evan came to. The lion rubbed his eyes as he yawned. The sun had definitely gone down. He reasoned that with the fullness of his gut and the warm air made him feel sleepy and the lion must have dozed off. But it couldn't have been too long for he could see the last rays of the sun had just vanished under the horizon.

The only Evan knew the pup was awake was by seeing if his eyes were open. And this was getting more difficult to tell these days. Simon's cantaloupe-sized cheeks forced the pup to be permanently squinting.

"Ready for breakfast?" Evan knew it wasn't morning but he enjoyed screwing with Simon's perception of time. And it worked. The pup had no idea what day it was or what time it was or even the season.

Simon only responded with a groan. The sheer enormity of his cheeks and double chin made it impossible for him to form words anymore.

From the ceiling of the basement hung a thick rubber tube with a nozzle at the end. Upstairs were tanks of cream specially prepared for Simon. It was all he consumed these days. Evan grabbed end of the hose by the nozzle. He walked over to a panel on one of the basement walls where as a red handle. The lion slowly turned the handle. A thick off-white liquid creeped its way down the tube and towards the nozzle.

"Just a little quality control check..." Evan muttered to himself. Sticking nozzle into his own mouth, he turned the handle further. More of the cream rushed down the tube, and Evan sucked it up with gusto. He groaned as gallon after gallon swelled up his flabby belly into a tight dome, forcing his shirt to stretch and rise upward along his gut. As his belly filled, his eyes winced in pain. Feeling ready to explode, Evan shut off the flow and removed the nozzle from his mouth. It took a few minutes for panting before the heavy lion caught his breath.

"Fuck me, that's good stuff..." he groaned. Evan frequently treated himself to some of Simon's cream. Needless to say, more than a few dozens of the pounds he recently put on could be blamed on the cream. One day, he'd have to convince Katie to set something like that in their bedroom.

"Alright, Simon, time for dinner!" Evan wiped his saliva off of the nozzle as he waddled around towards Simon's mouth. The pup weakly opened his maw and Evan shoved the nozzle in. He wandered over to the handle and crank the flow on to just the right setting: Fast enough to ensure Simon drinks gallons by the minute, but not too fast to where he'll choke on it.

Evan paced around the basement while he waited for Simon to eat his fill. Spotting the door to the downstairs walk-in refrigerator, he unlocked it and checked inside. Nearly half the racks were full of jars of Katie's Special Ingredient.

"Should harvest some lard from Simon soon. Pup'll enjoy that."

Shutting the door the fridge, Evan heard a metallic clank as the nozzle hit the floor. Simon must have his fill, the lion reasoned. The Golden Retriever learned earlier that it was not to trick Evan into eating less than he absolutely could. He pulled that stunt during one of the first weeks of his captivity. As punishment, Evan kept Simon full to point of exploding for several days. It was an extremely painful experience he did not want to repeat.

Evan waddled as fast as he could over to the handle, paw holding his filled belly to keep it from jostling around too much. Shutting off the flow, the lion wrapped the hose up and hung it from a hook screwed into the wall. Along another wall of the basement was a garden hose. Evan grabbed that and cranked on the hot water. A pool of cream laid on the floor of the basement, and Evan blasted it with water. The liquid rushed down a drain in the center of the floor. Evan turned the hose on Simon, washing away any cream left on his fur.

"Sorry, pup. No time for a full bath today. Katie and I have some adult activities to do tonight. But I'll give you an extra special bath next time." Simon groaned. All of the baths by Evan always included butt stuff. Despite the fact that the pup's ass was wider than a sofa, Evan always found a way to penetrate him. Though Simon was ultimately grateful for have some sexual interaction in his present state.

Shutting the water, Evan wrapped up the garden hose. He examined the basement making sure everything was in order. "Alright, I think my work here is done!" Evan said. Walking up to Simon, he gave the enormous dog's belly a few pats. "Goodnight!"

The lion turned off the light as he exited the basement. As he shut the door, he could hear whimpering echoing up the staircase.
1521111211.title: Some time later...

choices: Decline, but make plans to hang out later
153.content:
The door to apartment 704 swing open when Evan's paw was centimeters away from it. He had to suddenly pull back to prevent himself from accidentally hitting the orange kangaroo that was stepping into the hallway. The 'roo was startled seeing the lion outside his door without notice.

"Oh, oops! Sorry!" Evan said apologetically.

The 'roo had a paw of his chest as he calmed down. "No worries! You really surprised me there!" He was just about the same height as Evan and wore a white t-shirt and black sweatpants. The 'roo looked fairly proportional from the waist up with a little but of chub around his stomach and on his chest. However, his hindquarters were absurdly large. His butt looked like the 'roo stuffed two beachballs full of jelly into the back of his pants. His tail was engorged with lard and hung lazily over his rear. The 'roo's thighs looked just as chunky though one might surmise that there was some muscle in those legs to haul that enormous ass around. "Can I help you with something?"

"Oh, I was actually just here to introduce myself," the lion said. "I just moved in next door this morning in unit 703. I'm Evan!"

"Ah, cool. Good to meet you neighbor. I'm Ollie!" The two shook paws. "Hey, I was just head out to lunch. I never miss the lunch special at El Burrito Diablito! Care to join me, neighbor? My treat!"
153.title: The 'roo in the room next door

1531.content:
The metal chairs made a loud creaking noise as the 'roo pushed himself away from the table. Though Ollie wasn't as fat as some of the furs that Evan had seen in his limited time at Port Zaftig, the kangaroo was easily one of the widest with hips so large he needed to plant a chair under each of his bulbous legs. Ollie let out a sigh of satisfaction as he patted his full belly. A small mountain of paper wrappers laid on the plastic tray in front of him.

"Had enough?" joked Evan. The lion had ordered a much smaller lunch of a couple of tacos with a side of rice. Ollie, on the other hand, had order two dozen burritos. Sure, they weren't massive by any far stretch of the imagination, but it was still easily the most burritos the lion ever saw any one fur devour in a single sitting.

The 'roo pondered for a second, his paws lightly drumming on his belly. "Umm... nope! I've got room for more!" Ollie said. "Actually, I've got a hankering for ice cream! Come on! There's a great ice cream shop a couple of blocks away!"

"Alright, alright," said Evan as both furs got up and walked out of El Burrito Diablito. "But I don't know if I'll get anything."

"What? On a diet or something?" chuckled Ollie as he shuffled along the sidewalk, his ponderous posterior wobbling as he walked.

"Me? No!"

"That's good. Gotta get some meat on them bones!" The 'roo playfully poked at the lion's thin chest. Evan slapped his paw away.

"Hey, cut it out! Besides, it doesn't look like you've got 'meat' on your bones!" Evan jabbed Ollie's thigh, his paw sinking in an inch into the pliable flesh.

"Oh, relax!" said Ollie. "I'm just joking around with you! But there's no doubt you'll fill out soon enough!"

"What do you mean by that?"

"You have noticed?" asked Ollie. The 'roo gestured with his paw at the many portly furs around them. "What do they all have in common?"

"Well...um, they're all..." stammered Evan.

"You can say it: Fat!" Ollie said. "Practically every fur in this town is big. And can you blame us? The food is cheap and delicious, and nobody bothers anyone else for being fat!"

"Okay, furs are fat here. So what?"

"So, it's only a matter of time before you're sporting a baby belly yourself!" The 'roo grabbed at Evan's shirt, pulling it up to expose his flat abdomen. Once again, the lion smacked Ollie's paw away and yanked down his shirt.

"Yeah, right. Maybe a pound or two. But I'm not going to get super fat or anything."

The 'roo tisked. "It's always the stubborn ones that end up the biggest. An inevitable few pounds here, another dozen and a half pounds there, then they finally give in. Then they go nuts, eating like mad to make up for lost time." Evan did not look amused. "Oh, calm down! Perhaps you'll be the exception!"

The two furs were just outside the ice cream shop: Jen & Berry's. The 'roo stopped in front of the lion. "Hey, I have a few days off work. Why do I show you around? My treat! I'll take you around to all the best restaurants! You'll see why furs around here are so large!"
1531.title: Ollie's Offer

choices: Throw the match and purposefully lose the game
1532.content:
"Damn! How are you so good at this game?"

The 'roo had invited Evan over for a night of video games that evening. He had just picked up the latest new fighting game: Mega Mash Matrons. It was a game that the lion was looking forward to playing for a while now, so he was thrilled to find out that Ollie had it.

"What I can I say? Just chalk it up to practice!" the 'roo said, leaning forward and reaching for one of the several pizza boxes on the coffee table. "DR. MARIA WINS" the television screen flashed. Ollie was dressed very comfortably in a loose tank top that showed off his chunky arms and stretchy grey shorts that fit around his wide waist. He grabbed two slices of pizza and stacked them on top of each other before taking a big bite.

"How? This game just came out!" said Evan.

"Been playing it nonstop," the 'roo said between bites of pizza. "Butt's barely left the couch since."

"Uh huh, I bet that explains why it's so big!" joked Evan.

"Always the best seat in this house!" the 'roo said, wiggling in place.

"Yeah, yeah. It's like you're always carrying about two beanbag chairs behind you!"

"What? Jealous? Grow your own!" Ollie slid a pizza box over in the direction of the lion. Evan chuckled as he took out a slice and chomped on it.

"I don't know why you ordered so much pizza!" Evan said, finishing his slice.

"Hey, I didn't know how much you could eat," the 'roo replied.

"Yeah, but I'm not a fat ass like you!" joked Evan.

Ollie chuckled. "You talk a lot about my butt, you know that?"

"It's just so big!" Evan said, poking the 'roo's thick thigh. "I've never seen a guy with that much junk in his trunk!"

The 'roo smirked. "Well, then I have an idea. Let's make the next round interesting with a bet."

"Okay, what did you have in mind?"

Ollie thought for a second. "You know, I've been parked on this couch for so long. A butt massage would feel so great right about now!"

The lion laughed nervously. Evan had been somewhat fixated on the 'roo's backside, the two gelatinous mounds of pudge, since he first laid eyes on them earlier that day. The lion had always been a bit of an ass man, but here he was with a 'roo who had a butt bigger and nicer than any girl he had been with. The lion's loins stirred to life at the prospects of sinking his paws into that fur's rump. "O-okay, and if I win?"

"If you win...if you win...ah, all this pizza is yours!" said Ollie, gesturing to the remaining pizzas in front of them. "It looks like you need it anyways, skinny!"

"Deal!" said Evan. Ollie then started up another round. The screen flashed to the character selection screen and the 'roo began figuring out who to play as.

If Evan lost, he'd easily have an excuse to lay his paws on that vast butt. But if he purposefully tried losing, it might seem to obvious. Besides, Ollie was good enough of a player that he could easily beat the lion anyways.
1532.title: Mega Mash Matrons

15321.content:
"KING HEHEHE WINS" the television screen said.

"Well, I guess that you were bound to win one of them eventually!" said the 'roo. The lion's eyes were bugged out. Evan was doing all the wrong things during the game. He was dropping weapons and missing strikes. But when Ollie's character, the Glacier Ascenders, fell off the stage, the lion ending up winning instead.

"Uh, oh..." stammered Evan. "I wasn't expecting that. Heh, I thought I was toast..."

"Yep, and a bet's a bet after all. So..." Ollie shuffled his heavy body over towards Evan and in a single fluid motion positioned his massive self so that the 'roo was facing the lion, his enormous thighs straddling Evan and pinning him down into the couch. Surprised by the obese fur suddenly in his lap, Evan needed a second to collect himself. In that moment, Ollie twisted around and grabbed a pizza box from the table and tossed it on the couch beside them.

"Wait...what are you..doing?" asked Evan as he tired to wiggle himself out from underneath Ollie.

The 'roo grabbed Evan's right arm and pinned it under his leg, then doing the same with the lion's left arm. Evan struggled but he was firmly stuck up the 'roo's weight. Ollie then opened up the pizza box, grabbed a greasy slice, and held it up to the lion's face. "You won the bet! So you're getting your reward!" the 'roo said with a smirk on his face.

"But I-" The second Evan's mouth opened, Ollie shoved the entire slice in. The lion had no choice but to chew it all down and swallow it. He refused to open his mouth again, so the 'roo placed a pudgy paw over his nose.

"You're gonna have to breath sometime!" Ollie said. After a few moments, the lion gasped for air which gave the 'roo a chance to shove another entire slice into the lion's mouth. "You know, this'll be a lot easier if you were so stubborn!"

Seeing no other option, the lion opened his mouth for the next slice. Then the slice. Then the next pizza. Slice after slice entered the lion's belly, and Evan moaned in pain as his stomach filled to the brim with carbs and meat. A few times he tried resisting, but Ollie had ways of making the lion eat more and more.

"Alright, big cat. Last slice!" Ollie said nearly an hour after he started, holding a final piece up to Evan's grease and sauce stained mouth. The lion's mouth hung open, and the 'roo fed it to him. When he swallowed the last bit, the 'roo got off the lion, who groaned now that all the weight of the fur was off of him. Ollie admired his work: Evan looked as if he swallowed a basketball, his gut stretching his shirt tight and straining the button on his jeans. The lion's eyes were glazed over and he panted quietly.

"Aww, poor baby. Need a nap?" jested Ollie as he rubbed a paw against the lion's gut. He said nothing in response, only closing his eyes. The last time he heard before drifting off to sleep was Ollie saying, "Heh, didn't think I noticed you trying to lose?"
15321.title: A Bet's A Bet

choices: Ask Ollie about trying to be a streamer
153211.content:
When Evan awoke later that night, the only light on in the entire apartment came from one of the rooms down the hallway. Nursing his still bloated stomach, the lion slowly crept his way towards the room. The door was ajar and he peaked in. Inside of what appeared to be a kind of office room, Ollie was sat at what to Evan was an incredibly elaborate and presumably expensive gaming setup. A hi-tech computer with dual monitors, the latest generations of consoles lined up in a row, shelves upon shelves of games, and even a camera pointed in his direction. The 'roo sat shirtless on the extra-wide and comfy looking chair, his rolls and doughy moobs exposed to the cool conditioned air.

Around Ollie's head was a pair of impressive looking headphones. As Evan walked up to him, he saw that he was playing Skyram, some kind of fantasy/adventure RPG game that the lion just never could really get into. He could see the character Ollie created. It appeared to be some sort of lion paladin, but it looked like the 'roo cranked up the sliders all the way since the character looked absolutely gigantic, and not in terms in height.

The lion tapped Ollie on the shoulder. Startled, he turned around to see Evan behind him. "Oh, hey! Though you'd pass out all night or something!"

"Nah, I just woke up. Figured I'd head home to my own bed but wanted to say goodbye first," he said. "Wow, this is a pretty impressive gaming thing you got set up here..."

"Yeah, it's part of my job," Ollie explained. "I stream on Twatch all the time."

"Really? I never knew anyone who could make a living doing that."

"Well, you can if you're entertaining enough. Then you can rake in some serious cash. Check out my channel sometime! I stream under the name RooTube."

***

"Hi, uh, hey! And today I'll...oops, sorry...I'll be playing Advanced Warz! Growing up, this was one of my favorite games ever! And I hope you'll love it too! Now, let's start a new campaign..."

In bed, Evan was checking out Ollie's Twatch channel on his phone and skimming through some of the archived streams. One of the earliest streams was from several years ago and features Ollie playing a game that he, too, loved playing as a kid. The 'roo was shy and awkward, but Evan chalked that up to being a new streamer at the time. He couldn't help but notice how much skinnier Ollie used to be. If he had to guess, Evan figured it couldn't be more than 130 soaking wet.

Closing that video, Evan looked for something more recent. Ollie had streamed the night before and the lion clicked on that video. In it, the 'roo was playing Mega Mash Matrons. "Ah, been practicing then. So that's how he got so good so quick..." Evan watched for a little bit. Clearly, Ollie grew into being a more entertaining streaming since he sounded way more confident and assured of himself than in his very early video.

It was late and Evan didn't intent to watch the entire two hour long video. Skipping ahead a fair bit, he caught Ollie in the middle of reading comments from his viewers.

"...and thanks to icaraskid and hunkyacademia for the subs! And hey, boscobob just put up of Snack Challenge! Let's see...he wants to see if I can beat two level ten Dark Pats but while playing as PiggilyWuff. If I win, he's gonna send a case of Jen & Berry's my way! Well, I can never say no to a Snack Challenge, so here we go!"

Evan watched at Ollie easily defeat the challenge. "Can't wait for that ice cream to be dropped off! You know I love my ice cream!" Feeling very tire, the lion turned off the video and tossed his phone onto his bed.

The lion loved video games, and if he could be a stream on Twatch just like Ollie was, he could make bank while doing something he does anyways. But Evan figured there was a pretty high entry cost to being a Twatch streamer. Ollie's battlestation alone probably cost over ten thousand dollars. Still, he might want to ask about joining in on one of his streams. It might be fun to be front of the camera for one of those.
153211.title: RooTube

1532111.content:
"Alright, everyone! Goodnight!"

Clicking on his mouse, the lion brought an end for that day's Twatch stream. Only twenty or so people were watching him play games, but it wasn't too bad of a start for just his first week. The lion had to thank Ollie for some of those viewers. The 'roo promoted Evan's channel on his own stream. Not only that, but he helped the lion with a computer set of his own as well as a webcam. It wasn't like the hi-tech setup that Ollie had. Rather, it was older stuff that the 'roo had stored in his closet that, quite frankly, he was more than willing to get rid off. While it wasn't the best equipment on the market, it certainly worked for Evan. And he was happy to accept it.

Scrolling through his new submissions, a message popped up in his inbox. The lion was delighted. So far, nobody had messaged him, and he was glad to finally hear from a fan. He clicked the mail icon and saw a message that was sent by a user named whiteassnow777. Evan recognized that username; it was one he always saw in his audience for all of his streams since day one.

have you tried this game? you should try this game

Underneath the short message was a link. THE LION'S DEN, the link read. Cautiously, Evan clicked it. It brought up a separate window on his internet browser. The screen was black until the words ENTER YOUR FULL NAME popped up. Evan typed out his full name and pressed enter. Suddenly, the screen lit up with shades of vibrant blues and greens. There was a lion prowling through the Savannah. The game dimmed.


EAT THE MEAT
AVOID THE HYENAS
COLLECT 100 MEAT TO WIN


Soon, Evan was in control of the lion. Using the WSAD keys and mouse, he navigated the lion as it gracefully and swiftly ran through the bushes and grass of the game's environment. It wasn't long until he found the icon of a red floating steak. Evan moved the lion over to the steak and it disappeared with a loud gulp.

It didn't take long for Evan to get used to the game. The idea behind it was simple. The more the lion ate, the bigger and slower it got. This meant that the harder it was to evade the hyenas by simply running away. As the lion in the game got fuller, the more the player had to rely on stealth to escape the vicious pack, or use the lion's roar ability which scared away the hyenas for a while (though the cooldown time on the ability was very, very long).

Evan was only able to get 18 pieces of meat before getting got by one of the hyenas. "Not bad for a first try," said Evan as he favorites the tab. He scratched the underside of his full belly, the bottom of it now sticking out from underneath his shirt. "Ugh, still so bloated. Probably from all those ice cream sandwiches..." he reasoned.

The game he was sent seemed fun and might be worthy of playing on his stream. Evan thought about showing it to Ollie and seeing if he thought it might make good streaming material.
1532111.title: The Lion's Den

choices: Play one more round tonight, and then that's it
15321111.content:
It was only an hour into his streaming session when Evan started to feel ill. His stomach felt swollen and bloated. "God, what did I eat today?" he muttered to himself while he played another round of The Lion's Den. While this was only the fourth time ever playing, Evan was getting better at it. His high score so far was 32 meat pieces before the lion avatar got attacked by hyenas. Around 30 pieces and the lion got noticably fatter and slower, and required a much different set of skills to continue on. And Evan hadn't mastered that part of the game yet.

He burped. A little bit of stomach acid burned his throat. His sour stomach was starting to get extremely distracting. On his next round of The Lion's Den he was only able to get a few pieces before losing on account of his stomach being such a distraction.

"Ugh, everyone, I'm sorry," Evan apologized. "I'm going to have to call it quits early today. I'm starting to feel really ill." A few members of the audience typed in get well messages. Yet most of the furs watching (which, to Evan's surprise, was hovering around 50) said nothing in the chat just as they had done for the entire session.

Shutting down the stream, Evan got up from his chair and saw just how swollen and round his belly was. "God, seriously, what did I eat that's making me so bloated?" His belly, so round and big that it made it difficult to see his toes, stretched out his red shirt and forced it to ride up several inches, exposing a fair amount of creamy fur. Had he been able to see past his belly, Evan would have seen that sometime during the stream the top button of his shorts exploded off.

Stripping down to his underwear, he carefully laid down in bed to rest, hoping a nap would ease his sour stomach. And with a paw gently rubbing his blimped up belly, he shut his eyes.

***

Evan wandered around the warm fields, searching for a pool of water to drink from. It was a hot day and the lion was feeling parched. Walking around the Savannah on not his two hind legs but on all fours, he searched for something to sooth his dry throat. That is, until he saw something red and shiny off in the distance.

Curious, the lion swiftly made its way to what had been shimmering in the distance. Floating a couple feet off the ground was a steak, glistening in the sunlight. Evan's stomach growled; it no longer wanted water but the hunk of meat hanging in front of him. He licked his chops.

EAT THE MEAT


Letters appeared above the steak. But Evan didn't need the invitation. Leaning forward with his mouth agap, the lion inched closer to the meat. However, it disappeared moments before he could chomp down on it. Confused, Evan looked around. But he felt his stomach feel sated and the taste of meat was on his tongue. He purred in delight.

Another red shimmer was off in the distance, and the lion hurried its way over. Again, another shiny hunk of meat hung mysteriously in the air. Again, it disappeared seconds before Evan could take a bite. And again, the lion felt as if he had a delicious snack. Two more shimmering red object were on the horizon, and Evan made his move.

Two dozen pieces of meat later, and Evan felt bloated and lethargic. His svelte body had ballooned out with meat. A few dozen more and the lion's belly would surely drag along the ground. Yet there was an insatiable desire in him for more and more of this mysterious meat. Lazily dragging his rounding body over to yet another steak, Evan slowly opened his maw ready for another bit of meat to somehow fill his already full belly.

Evan heard the cackling of many hyenas as the meat vanished into his belly. One or two wouldn't be a problem. But they sounded like they were coming from the left, right, and behind him. He spotted rustling in nearby grass, and Evan ran. Or, at least, he ran as well as he could in his inflated state which was more like a speedy trot.

He groaned, seeing another hunk of meat floating in his path. Groaning, he marched past, it vanishing into his belly and ballooning it out another inch. Another steak hung before his path, but all other directions were swarmed with hyena, and he had no choice but to eat that stake, and the one lined up right behind that, and the several more behind that.

Eventually, Evan's walk dropped to an awkward shuffle. His meat-filled gut dragged along the ground, drawing a thick line in the dirt for the hyenas to following. Clawing his paws into the earth, he tried dragging himself another inch. But it was useless; the hyenas were close, and soon he felt one of them sink its teeth into his fleshy rump.

Evan woke up in a cold sweat. It was dark in his bedroom. Checking his phone, he discovered it was close to midnight. Lying back down in bed, he felt his belly, still quite full, jostle about as he plopped back down.

"It was only a nightmare..." Evan mutter to himself. "A nightmare about...that game...Maybe I should give it a rest? But damn, it is a fun game..."
15321111.title: In the Lion's Den

choices: ...find the fur who sent me the game?"
153211112.content:
Knocking again on Evan's front door, Ollie waited patiently to see if the lion was home. The 'roo hadn't heard from him in nearly two weeks. Evan hadn't been streaming either. So Ollie decided to waddle over next door and do a welfare check.

Curious, Ollie jiggled the handle of the door to find it was unlocked. He let himself in. "Evan? You here?" The living room was empty. Peaking down the hall, he spotted a bit of light coming from the bedroom door as it was open just slightly. Cautiously making his way down the hall, the 'roo's nose was assaulted with a heavy musk that only stronger as he got closer.

"Evan?" aske Ollie as he gently nudged the door open. "Are you...here..." He saw the lion sat in front of his computer. But in the two weeks since he last saw Evan, the already chunky lion had nearly doubled in size. His office chair struggled to hold his girth; rolls of fat spilled over the armrests as his naked rear poured out from the sides. A tail thick as a sausage laid out lazily. His gut, being so massive and taking up so much of his lap, made it difficult for him to reach his mouse and keyboard. Evan had positioned his body awkwardly so as to be able to reach both.

The lion didn't notice Ollie had entered. As the heavy 'roo approached, he saw Evan was playing some sort of computer game. On the screen, a rotund lion waddled through grasslands as it approached the icon of a large slab of meat. It escaped with a cartoonish gulping noise. Ollie could hear Evan groan softly as the number in the corner flashed 71.

"Evan! You there?" Ollie said, shaking the lion by his shoulder. His fur was greasy and matted. He guessed Evan hadn't bathed in a while.

The lion shook his head as if being snapped out of a trance. "Oh, hey Ollie!" he said. "What's up?"

"What's up? I haven't seen you in forever! What's been going on?"

"Oh? I've just been playing this new game I found! It's pretty fun! I've just beaten my high score!" A pudgy paw scratched his enormous gut. Evan then let out a burp as if having eaten a feast.

"I mean...what the hell happened to you? You got...big in a hurry!" Ollie had seen plenty of fat furs in Port Zaftig. Even he himself piled on quite a bit of weight in a short period of time. Yet Evan's growth was astounding. "What the hell have you been eating?"

"Not much. I've mostly just been playing my game!"

"Yeah, right! Look at you! What did you do to yourself?" Ollie sunk a paw into Evan's gut. It sank easily under the layers of lard. Though it was stopped by an overstuffed belly. Evan must have just finished gorging himself.

"What do you mean? I just..." He trailed off upon seeing his body. It was only as if right then he actually saw what he looked like. Panicked, Evan pawed at his flabby gut, poked his moobs, seeing if they were in fact real. "Oh my God...how did this..."

"Seriously, what have you been eating?" Ollie demanded to know.

"Nothing! Really! Just some snacks here and there! But I don't think I've made a meal in a while! Haven't needed to! I just, uh, have been feeling kinda full! Like, right now I feel stuffed to the brim!"

"But I really have eaten an-" The cackling of hyenas came from the computer before it flashed GAME OVER. Evan whirled his obese body around to see that he had left his game unattended. "Damn it! I lost!" The game invited Evan to put his initials in to the 2nd place slot. In first place was someone with the initials OTT. Their high score was 100.

"Look, we've got figure out what's going on...after you take a shower. You kinda reek, dude.."

Evan lifted a heavy arm and sniffed. "Woah, yeah...I don't remember when I took a shower last. But could you...help me out of this chair? I think I'm stuck..."

***

When Ollie came back an hour later, he found Evan napping in his bed. The enormous naked feline laid on his side, his sheets bunched up showing off his blubbery backside. The 'roo blushed, and tucked the sheet back over to cover Evan's rump.

Sitting down at Evan's computer, the 'roo fired up the machine. He had taken off the armrests to free the lion, so Ollie was able to sit even with his incredibly wide behind. 154312.content:
"Look out the window there. See that really tall, silver building? That's the Episteme Labs building. Heard of them? I don't know too much about them. But then again, not many furs are exactly sure what they do. I read that they're listed as a pharmaceutical company, but I've heard they do loads more, even take contracts with the military and the like. But unless you work for them, nobody is sure exactly what they work on."

"Anyways, the building was finished a little less than fifteen years ago. For the first two years, nothing out of the ordinary happened. Then Terry went missing. Terry McGregor was, I think, 18 or 19 when he vanished. At the time, he was doing an internship with Episteme Labs. Normally, Episteme wants nothing to do with students. But they made an exception for Terry. See, he was a savant when it came to biochemical engineering. The kid almost done with his Bachelor's degree when most furs would be graduating high school! He was an up-and-comer and bound
to make amazing breakthroughs. So Episteme wanted to snatch him up and they made an exception for him."

"One day, Terry didn't come home from his internship. His parents filled a missing persons report, and the police investigated. At first Episteme claimed that Terry didn't show up for his internship that day. But here's the thing: The building across the street to Episteme Labs happyen to have a camera that pointed across the street and it recorded Terry walking in the the Labs that day. And it also didn't catch him coming out. The Labs got in a heap of trouble, and soon detectives were busting down their doors. They fought the warrants as best as they could but eventually Episteme had to let the authorities in. But they found nothing, not a clue where Terry went. Months dragged on into years, and the case went cold."

"This is where things get wild. A few years after Terry disappeared, some photos came up online. Now, come here, let me show you this. It's Terry missing poster. Handsome lion, huh? Okay, see above his left eyebrow? See how in his fur there's an almost perfectly straight line of four spots? Remember that. Now, here's one of the photos. It was from a while back. Cell phone camera weren't great, so the pictures are pretty dark and grainy. But see right here? Four dots, in a straight line! That's his eye, his left side of his face! And that, his cheeks? Huge! The size of a coconut! You can even make out a few chins from this angle! And here's another photo, taken from a little further away. Yeah, that's his head. His neck is just completely swallowed up with fat! And here's the final one. That's him, that huge pile of lard. At least, people think it is. It's hard to tell how big he might be."

"After those photos came out, rumors started swirling that Terry was being held prisoner in Episteme Labs somewhere. Some think he's being tested on, others think they're keeping him because of an accident in the lab. It got to the point that Episteme Labs had to put out a statement denying this. But after a while, those rumors died down and One Ton Terry is now kind of an urban legend used to scare kids away from the Episteme Labs Building. I personally just think the kid got overwhelmed with being such a genius that he skipped town and to live his own life. But that's j- Oh, that's my phone! Gotta take this! Business call!"

I HAVE NEW LEADS TO OTT. NEED HELP. PLEASE DM ME. INCLUDE DESCRIPTION OF YOUR PHYSICAL CHARACTERISTICS.

Nobody had responded to the post. But since hardly anyone seemed to occupy that subforum anymore, that didn't surprise the lion.

Can you meet me in the parking garage on 3rd and Oak downtown downtown? 4th level, 11:15pm. Please come alone.

info.brief_description: A coastal city where the air is hot, the ocean is cool, and furs of absurd weights live.
info.description:
Many years ago on this site, there was a story called Zaftig City. Its focus was on weight gain and fat furs. I contributed many chapters to that story and was sadden to see the whole thing get deleted some years ago. And while there are a number of other stories that center on fat furs, none of them capture the magic Zaftig City had. Revivals and attempts to recreate the original have been met with some success. This is my attempt at trying to capture lighting in a bottle again.

Port Zaftig is known for three things: Sun, Surf, and Sand. A premier vacation destination, furs from all over flock to the Port's beautiful beaches and blue oceans. With warm and sunny days nearly all year long, the city thrives on tourism and devotes an entire section of the beachside property to luxury restaurants and hotels for visitors practically sectioning them off from the towns residents.

This, though, is everything that Evan knows about Port Zaftig. Having grown up in a rural town in a landlocked state, the lion dreamed of residing in a sunny beautiful seaside city. Now, as a 20-something, he's ready to make his dream a reality. For years, he worked long hours and picked up on sidegigs to save up enough money to leave his small hometown. With enough cash to survive a few months in Zaftig, he packed up what few worldly possession he had into his car and made the multi-day drive to his new home.

What Evan does not know, however, is the easy way to spot the locals from the tourists. Many furs visiting are like him, fit and trim. All of the locals, though, are ridiculously obese. Thanks to the dirt cheap cost of food at Port Zaftig, a skinny fur there is either just visiting or won't be skinny much longer. Will Evan buck that trend? Or will Port Zaftig grow on him in more ways than one?

Rules & Guidelines

1) Please put some effort into your chapters. Avoid things like single sentence chapters, horrendous grammar, unreadable formatting, and the like. Short chapters are fine if they are trying to drive the story in a particular direction.

2) The focus of this story should be on weight gain, and it should focus on Evan in particular. Other characters can get big alongside Evan, however he is the main character and needs to be growing. But feel free in include things that are weight gain adjacent e.g. bloating, slob, or button popping.

3) Weight gain ought to be the main focus. However, feel free to include adjacent topics like blueberry transformation, inflation, muscle growth, height growth, etc. But please try and avoid things like instant weight gain or stuff like magic. If in doubt, it's easier to ask for forgiveness than permission.

4) Sex and graphic content is allowed, both gay and straight. But keep the focus on the overall story on weight gain and not on sex.

5) Characters who are minors and their weight gain is permissible. However, they should not be involved in any sort of sexual acts.

6) This is a kind of "choose your own adventure" story, so please make your chapters options as kinds of choices for Evan to make. For example, try to make your options in the form of "Evan chose X or Evan chose Y" rather than "X happened to Evan or Y happened to Evan". Ignore this suggestion if you need to move the story's timeline along.

7) Characters cannot be killed off. And please don't write about anything gross like scat or vomit.

And, of course, have fun.
